education.institution: 中国人民公安大学（提前批）
education.area: 信息网络安全学院 - 网络空间安全专业

publications.name: NFC-RFAE: Semi-supervised RF Authentication for Mobile NFC Card System
publications.publisher: Publisher: 2024 IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference (WCNC)
publications.authors: Authors: Yuwei Yang; Yijie Xun; Tianhao Lv; Jiajia Liu
publications.summary: Summary: NFC-RFAE is proposed, a semi-supervised authentication system based on RF signals, demonstrating high accuracy, high recall rate, low latency, and minimal space occupancy in real-life scenarios, including a vehicle keyless system and a mobile bank system.

publications.name: NFC-IDS: An Intrusion Detection System Based on RF Signals for NFC Security
publications.publisher: 2023 International Wireless Communications and Mobile Computing (IWCMC)
publications.Authors: Yuwei Yang; Yijie Xun; Yumeng Yan; Jiajia Liu; Ziteng Jin
publications.summary: Summary: We propose an intrusion detection system (IDS) based on radio frequency (RF) signals for NFC security, called NFC-IDS.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
